## Selected News / Media Stories

**Jan. 18, 2024**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in [Canadian Press article about food safety and 'best before' dates](https://www.cp24.com/lifestyle/experts-weigh-in-on-food-safety-after-best-before-date-passes-1.6733054).

**Oct. 27, 2023**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in [a Globe and Mail article about climate change impacts on water-borne disease](https://www.theglobeandmail.com/canada/article-marathon-races-climate-change/).

**Aug. 26, 2023**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in [a KQED article about an outbreak at a Tough Mudder event in California](https://www.kqed.org/news/11959242/what-happened-at-tough-mudder-sonoma-hundreds-get-sick-with-possible-bacterial-infection).

**July 3, 2023**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in [a news article from the Sacramento Observer about beach's water quality](https://sacobserver.com/2023/07/how-clean-is-your-favorite-beachs-water/).

**Dec. 12, 2022**. Dr. Young appeared on Episode 2 of the [TMU Environmental Applied Science and Management Program "The Climate" podcast](https://anchor.fm/ensciman/episodes/Episode-2-The-journey-to-academia-isnt-always-linear---Dr--Ian-Young-tells-shares-his-experience-and-how-his-research-contributes-to-safe-Ontario-beaches-e1s4qoo) to talk about his background, research, and advice for future students and trainees.

**July 17, 2022**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in a [Triathlete Magazine article about brain-eating amoebas](https://www.triathlete.com/culture/news/how-worried-should-swimmers-really-be-about-brain-eating-amoeba/).

**July 14, 2022**. Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed in a [Triathlete Magazine article about our published study on determinants of swimming pool bather hygienic behaviours](https://www.triathlete.com/training/stop-peeing-in-the-pool-you-sickos/).

**June 1, 2022**. Dr. Young's Ontario Early Career Researcher Award was featured in this [Toronto Metropolitan University article](https://www.torontomu.ca/research/news-events/2022/06/toronto-metropolitan-university-faculty-secure-early-researcher-awards/).

**May 31, 2022**. Dr. Young was interviewed on live TV in this [Breakfast Television segment about beach water quality](https://www.breakfasttelevision.ca/videos/these-are-torontos-safest-beaches-in-terms-of-water-quality).

**Nov, 17, 2021**. Dr. Young and Dr. Sekercioglu's funded study on improving food safety in ready-to-eat meat processing plants in Ontario was [profiled by Faculty of Community Services](https://www.torontomu.ca/fcs-news-events/news/2020/05/ryerson-funding-covid19-rapid-response-round1/).

**Jul. 19, 2021**: Dr. Young was quoted and interviewed for the [Climate Atlas of Canada's section on "waterborne disease and climate change"](https://climateatlas.ca/waterborne-disease-and-climate-change).
